title: [娱乐]Simple Elevators —— 一款轻量级的电梯插件[1.7-1.16]
author: 风筱墨
txt_content:
本帖最后由 风筱墨 于 2020-12-27 17:04 编辑 


一款轻量级的电梯插件 By: BENZ56
搬运授权:

Simple Elevators 插件介绍轻量级的电梯插件,顾名思义这款插件非常有特色和易于理解的简单电梯,只需要拖放插件到您的服务器插件文件,然后编辑配置文件根据您的喜好来使用,最后一个个的电梯就配置完成了!如果您愿意的话也可以用命令来创建电梯由哪些方块构成.单个电梯也是可以构成的.（可以在配置文件里面定义各种方块的组合）让玩家们按 Spacebar 向上一层,然后按 Shift 键向下一层.测试服务器142.44.222.241:25602复制代码
Simple Elevators 特征简单易用世界白名单选项通过命令来创建电梯可配置的BossBar消息可配置的Title消息可配置的消息栏消息。延迟电梯升降选项特别的电梯声音颜色和大小可配置粒特效箭头使用任意方块组合的电梯JSON与悬停和点击事件的消息
Simple Elevators 权限与命令命令/elevator别名: [simpleelevators, elevators, se]以下所有的命令都需要elevator.commands权限以及单独的命令权限
/elevator [help]别名: [h]权限: elevator.commands.help打开帮助菜单,帮助菜单是可以点击的,包含带有说明的Lore悬停消息.
/elevator create <combination> [distance]别名: [cr, c]权限: elevator.commands.create在当前位置创建指定的方块/电梯,指定距离将创建另一个位置的电梯距离
/elevator list别名: [li, l]权限: elevator.commands.list显示你当前列表里面的所有电梯权限
权限elevator.use可以使用所有电梯的权限
elevator.use.<combination>可以使用特定的电梯权限
elevator.distance.<distance>电梯的最大高度,例如,MaxDistance 是 40 并且玩家可以使用电梯的情况下,玩家最高可到达的高度就是 40 高度.
elevator.bypass.cooldown绕过已配置 elevatorCooldown 的权限
elevator.bypass.distance忽略已配置的 maxDistance (电梯最高高度)的权限
elevator.update拥有该权限的玩家可以收到插件的更新消息 (不建议给予玩家)
Simple Elevators 使用过程


Simple Elevators 配置与语言CONFIG.YML:# Permissions:
#   elevator                    - permission to see help message.
#   elevator.list               - permission to see Elevator list.
#   elevator.create             - permission to create Elevators.
#   elevator.reload             - permission to reload config.
#   elevator.use                - permission to use ALL Elevators.
#   elevator.use.combination    - permission to use a specific Elevator.
#   elevator.distance.bypass    - permission to bypass/ignore maxDistance.


# No permission message: Enable(true) / Disable(false)
noPermission: '&cYou do not have permission to do this!'
enabled: true

# Plugin Prefix:
# - Recommended: End prefix with two spaces.
# - Leave BLANK to disable. - pluginPrefix: ''
pluginPrefix: '&7[&eSimple Elevators&7]  '

# Elevator Combination:
# - Add as many combinations as you want. First Material is the block at your feet.
# - Syntax: ( - 'Material, Material') or ( - 'COLOR_CARPET, COLOR_WOOL') *Or mix*
# - Use colored Wool/Carpet as seen in the defaults. colors: http://imgur.com/a/iSwzW
Combinations:
- 'QUARTZ_BLOCK, REDSTONE_BLOCK'
- 'IRON_BLOCK, GOLD_BLOCK'
- 'RED_CARPET, LIGHT_GRAY_WOOL'


# Enable/Disable worlds:
# - Add worlds(Case-sensitive) to exclusively enable those e.g:
#------------------
# enabledworlds:
#    - world
#    - world_nether
#------------------
# - The above example will enable Elevators ONLY in those worlds.
# - Leave BLANK to enable ALL worlds.
enabledworlds:


# Max Elevator distance:
# - Set to 255 or higher to ignore completely.
maxDistance: 40

# Replace blocks at destination Elevator:
# - Default: true - will replace blocks at destination when creating a SET of Elevators.
createReplace: true

# Elevator ding sound: (Unsupported in 1.7 & 1.8)
ding: true

# ActionBar: (Unsupported in 1.7 - 1.9)
actionBarEnabled: true
# - Floor messages.
floorUp: '&e&lYou have been taken one floor &a&lUP'
floorDown: '&e&lYou have been taken one floor &c&lDOWN'

# Arrow Particles: (Unsupported in 1.7 - 1.10)
arrow_enabled: true
# - Enable/disable arrow on current and/or destination floor.
arrow_currentFloor: true
arrow_destinationFloor: true
# - Every Minecraft color is Valid (names(e.g. red) and color codes (e.g &c):
# - colors: http://imgur.com/a/v3TzU (Use 'random' for a random color)
arrow_color_up: 'green'
arrow_color_down: 'red'
# - arrow size: (blocks in height)
arrow_size: 2.0复制代码
MESSAGES.YML:# This is the Message file for all Simple Elevator messages.
#
# All messages are fully customizable and support color codes, formatting and ASCII symbols.
# Set the Prefix and use %prefix% to add the corresponding prefix to a message.
# Leave a message blank ('') to disable it.
#
# You can also create messages with Hover and Click events. Syntax options: (Space between comma and quote is NOT allowed)
#  - ["Message","/Command"]
#  - ["Message","Hover"]
#  - ["Message","/Command","Hover"]
#  - ["Message","/Command","Suggest"]
#  - ["Message","/Command","Hover","Suggest"]
# You can add as many events to a message as you want. Example:
# '%prefix% &cInvalid arguments! ["&c&n&oHelp","/se help","&aClick to get help!"]'
# The "Suggest" tag is used if the click event should suggest the command. Default is Run.

Prefix: '&7<&e&lSimple Elevators&7>'
Messages:
  General:
    InvalidPermission: '%prefix% &c抱歉,你没有权限执行此操作!'
    PlayerOnly: '%prefix% &c命令只能对玩家使用!'
    InvalidArguments: '%prefix% &c无效的参数!请检查指令是否正确!'
    InvalidCreateInput: '%prefix% &c无效的电梯方块或距离错误!'
    InvalidMaterialInput: '%prefix% &c电梯包含一个未知的方块或者材料!'
    InvalidElevatorDestination: '%prefix% &c无法放置电梯!'
    ElevatorDestinationOccupied: '%prefix% &c目标被占用!请删除目标中的方块.'
    ElevatorDestinationTooGreat: '%prefix% &c目标电梯距离太大! 最大: %maxDistance%'
    UnknownCombination: '%prefix% &c未知的组合!组合范围从(1 - %combinations%)'
    ElevatorPlaced: '%prefix% &a电梯成功创建啦!'
    ElevatorNotPlaced: '%prefix% &c不能在这里创建电梯!'
    ConfigurationsReloaded: '%prefix% &a配置文件已成功重新加载! &c&lBY: Renekton67'复制代码

Simple Elevators 安装1. 将 Simple Elevators 放入插件文件夹中2. 启动或重新加载服务器3. 根据自己的喜好编辑生成的配置文件
Simple Elevators 版本目前支持版本: 1.7 - 1.16注意!!!1.7 版本禁用 Actionbars 和 Titlebars 功能1.8 版本禁用 BossBars 功能推荐试用版本: 1.8 - 1.9 及以上
Simple Elevators 下载支持原作者,请大家到原帖下载以下是我个人简单汉化的语言文件
最后,搬运不易,请不要吝啬您的人气哦,不会扣自己的.







messages.yml


2019-8-27 00:16 上传
点击文件名下载附件

由@白凌账号提供
